text: Muchacha italiana viene a casarse, is a Mexican telenovela. It is produced and directed by Pedro Damián for Televisa. It is a remake of the 1971 Mexican telenovela Muchacha italiana viene a casarse. Livia Brito and José Ron star as the protagonists of the telenovela. Nailea Norvind and Mike Biaggio star as antagonists. == Cast == Actor Character Livia Brito Fiorella Bianchi José Ron Pedro Ángeles Nailea Norvind Federica Ángeles Mike Biaggio Osvaldo Ángeles Ricardo Blume Mario Bianchi Fernando Allende Sergio Ángeles Francisco Gattorno Aníbal Valencia Raquel Garza Adela Ela Velden Gianna Bianchi Eleazar Gomez Benito Segura José Pablo Minor Gael Ángeles Isela Vega Eloísa Ángeles Paula Marcellini Roxana Rivera Enrique Rocha Vittorio Dragone César Bono Reynaldo Segura Claudio Baez Máximo Ángeles Maribel Guardia Julieta Mimi Morales Sonia Ángeles Jessica Coch Tania Casanova Lourdes Munguía Joaquina Sol Mendez Roy Diana Alarcón Salvador Pineda Dante Dávalos Dobrina Cristeva Belinda Candela Márquez Aitana de la Riva == Mexico broadcast == Timeslot (ET/PT) No. of episodes Premiered Premiered Ended Ended Date Premiere Ratings Date Finale Ratings Monday to Friday 4:15PM 176 October 20, 2014 18.1 June 21, 2015 == References == == Other websites == * Category:Telenovelas by Televisa Category:2014 Mexican television series debuts
